5Q4bMK4L.title: Molecular characterization of ethambutol-resistant Mycobacteria luberculosis isolates recovered from Wuhan
5Q4bMK4L.abstract: The research aims to explore the molecular characteristics of Mycobacterium tuberculosis ethambutol resistance in Wuhan,to establish a rapid test method about the EMB resistance of Mycobacterium tuberculosis and to understand the transmission of Beijing genotype. PCR amplification was performed on the 85 isolates to characterize the embB gene. At the same time,the identification of Beijing genotype in the 85 clinical isolates was performed using RD105 deletion-targeted multiplex PCR. The results show that 15( 68. 2%) of the 22 ethambutol resistant isolates were found to have a mutation in the embB gene and among the 15 isolates,fourteen had a mutation at codon 306,the mutation types were M306V ATG→GTG and M306I ATG→ATA,the other one was at codon 319,Y319C TAT→TGT; Meanwhile,five of the 43 EMB susceptible isolates had also found a mutation in embB gene,four was at codon 306 and one was at codon 319. Of the 85 clinical isolates,78( 91. 8%) were Beijing genotypes and 7( 8. 2%) were non-Beijing genotypes. According to the research,mutations in embB are not only found in ethambutol resistant isolates,but also in ethambutol susceptible isolates. Because the ethambutol resistant isolates are also resistant to other drugs at the same time,we can't exclude the relationship between other drugs and mutations in embB at codon 306. Therefore,the role of embB306 mutations remains unclear. In addition,"Beijing genotype"strains of Mycobacterium tuberculosis were typically prevalent in Wuhan,which should arouse our more attention.

Wvti39E6.title: Study on ACE Inhibitor in Hydrolyzates of Rice Bran Protein
Wvti39E6.abstract: Objective To obtain angiotensin-converting-enzyme (ACE) inhibitor from the hydrolyzates of rice bran protein.Methods The deposition method of adjusting isoelectric point was adapted to get rice bran protein. The protein was hydrolyzed with pepsin and trypsin successively. The hydrolyzed products were separated to many groups by gel chromatography and ACE inhibitor activity of each group was tested. One group with high inhibitor activity was further separated and purified by ion exchange chromatography.Results The molecular weight of ACE inhibitor peptide obtained was 307.1 and the isoelectric point was 5-6 with the IC_ 50 being 0.061 mg/ml. Its bioactivity was stable in the hydrolyzates digested with pepsin and trypsin.Conclusion ACE inhibitor was obtained from the hydrolyzates of rice bran protein.

rV6btKbS.title: Preparation of Angiotensin Converting Enzyme Inhibitor from Rice Bran
rV6btKbS.abstract: To obtain angiotensin converting enzyme(ACE)inhibitor from protease-digested rice bran protein,the method of salt-out was adopted to extract rice bran protein,which was then digested by pepsin,trypsin,papain separately or jointly.The hydrolysised products were separated through gel and ion-exchange chromatogram.The separated parts were determined for their ACE inhibitor activity.The results showed that the separated parts of protease-digested contained stronger ACE inhibitor activity with the strongest part coming from pepsin and trypsin joint degested.The results lay the foundation for turther study on its structure.

gE98OUBJ.title: Rapid detection of acrylamide residue in heated food by enzyme linked immunosorbent assay
gE98OUBJ.abstract: Enzyme linked immunosorbent assay(ELISA)was developed to detect acrylamide residue in heated food.Acrylamide-BSA immuno-antigen was prepared by glutaraldehyde method,and was injected into rabbits body to prepare anti-acrylamide-BSA polyclonal antibody.The results showed that the determination limitation was 50μg/L when the concentration of coating antigen was 1.5μg/mL,and the dilution of antibody was 116000.The detection range of the inhibition curve was 50μg/L~1280μg/L.The recovery rate of acrylamide in the samples ranged from 92.6% to 95.5%.The detection method was very rapid,accurate and had a good specificity.It is suitable for rapid detection of acrylamide in the production of heated food.

XCgKnhXz.title: Establishment of Loop-mediated Isothermal Amplification for the Detection of Streptococcus hemolyticus
XCgKnhXz.abstract: Objective: To develop a loop-mediated isothermal amplification (LAMP) method for the rapid detection of Streptococcus hemolyticus. Methods: According to the scpA gene of Streptococcus hemolyticus, 4 specific primers were designed for LAMP amplification. Six different Streptococcus hemolyticus strains were validated by LAMP and identified by enzymatic digestion. The sensitivity of LAMP method was evaluated by serial gradient dilution of Streptococcus hemolyticus solution. Results: LAMP could be used for the rapid and sensitive detection of Streptococcus hemolyticus with a high sensitivity and a detection limit of 16.7 CFU/mL. Moreover, the detection limit was 10 CFU/mL in milk samples. Conclusion: LAMP method is a simple, rapid and feasible method for the detection of Streptococcus hemolyticus.

Lv2c4M79.title: Synthesis,Recombinant Expression and Functional Analysis of Filamentousphage Gene V Protein
Lv2c4M79.abstract: Objective: To explore the gene synthesis,recombinant expression and functions of filamentousphage gene V protein(GVP).Methods: According to the gene sequence of GVP,eight oligonucleotide fragments with the selected E.coli-preferred codon were designed,and the GVP gene sequence was synthesized by overlap extension PCR.Then the synthesized sequence was inserted into pET-28a-c(+) plasmid.The recombinant plasmids obtained were transformed into E.coli to screen positive isolates of GVP.GVP expression in the positive strains was induced with IPTG.The recombinant proteins were purified by Ni+-NTA affinity chromatography.Results: GVP gene was successfully synthesized and highly expressed in E.coli BL21(DE3) under the induction of IPTG,and the equilibrium dissociation constant was 7.27 × 10-5 mol/L between GVP and ssDNA.Conclusion: The recombinant GVP has high affinity with ssDNA and therefore can be used for the ssDNA detection of some pathogenic microorganisms in food.

PNFbLFI8.title: Cloning and Expression of Very Low Density Lipoprotein Receptor's Ligand Binding Domain
PNFbLFI8.abstract: Objective To construct the expression vector of VLDL-R's ligand binding domain fusion protein and study its expression and purification in E.coli.Methods The DNA fragment of LBR1-8 was amplified from VLDL-R cDNA recombinant plasmid by PCR and was inserted into plasmid pET28a(+)to construct the prokaryotic expression plasmid pET28a(+)-LBR1-8.The positive recombinant plasmid was transformed into E.coli strain Rosetta and then was induced by IPTG,with the expression conditions optimized.The fusion protein was purified by Ni+-NTA chromatography column,analyzed and identified by SDS-PAGE and Western blotting.Result The recombinant expression plasmid was identified by PCR,digested with restricted endoenzymes and subjected to DNA sequencing.It was found to be consistent with the predicted result.The host cells containing the recombinant plasmid that successfully expressed LBR1-8 after being induced by IPTG and the optimal inducing conditions were determined.Conclusion The prokaryotic expression and plasmid pET28a(+)LBR1-8 was successfully constructed and the target recombinant protein LBR1-8 was expressed and purified,which lays a foundation for the study on the functions of VLDL-R function and its application,especially on its ligand recognition and binding characteristics.

gKNIyh1G.title: The PCR for Detecting Genetically Modified Components in Maize
gKNIyh1G.abstract: This experiment made use of the modified CTAB,carried on Mararate isolation and purification of DNA from various corn samples.Using polymerase chain reaction technology,and using the corn specific endogenous gene IVR as a reference,we coumd validate the amplification of DNA.If the result is positive,then We could amplify the foreign gene CaMV35S and NOS of the transgenic corn.According to the!PCR results,we can determine whether the samples contain transgenic ingredients.The results show that genetic modification exists in some samples of corns which could be found in market with no permit identification.

iypK1bEp.title: Exploration of Training System for Bio-pharmaceutical Undergraduates Based on the College-enterprise Cooperative Mode
iypK1bEp.abstract: With the rapid development of bio-pharmaceutical industry,bio-pharmaceutical industry will increase the demand for talents.This paper analyzes the demand characteristics of bio-pharmaceutical industry professionals,and discusses the college-enterprise cooperation in the bio-pharmaceutical undergraduate training objectives,training model,training requirements,training and safeguard measures.

T7wVSZaf.title: STUDY ON THE PREPARATION OF TETRACYCLINE AND CHLORTE-TRACYCLINE IMMUNOANTIGENS
T7wVSZaf.abstract: Tetracycline immunoantigens(TC-BSA)and Chlortetracycline immunoantigen(CTC-BSA)were prepar-ed via glutaric dialdehyde method and succinic acid method t,hen the different immunoantigens were injected into New Zealand rabbits in order to prepare different polyclonal antibodies.The special antibodies towards TC and CTC were identified by indirect enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay(ELISA.)It was proved that the serum titers of the two kinds of antibodies all reached 1:320000,which provided good immunoantigen for next preparation of the special antibodies towards TC and CTCa,nd also acted as an useful foundation for the detection of this kind of anti-biotic residue in food through immune methods.

DaOBMNxj.title: Effect of peanut oil,rapeseed oil and soybean oil on organs,biochemical indexes and lipid peroxidation in rats
DaOBMNxj.abstract: In this paper,to offer the data of human rational taking in oil,the effect of peanut oil,rapeseed oil,soybeen oil on body weight,organ coefficient,biochemical indexes and lipid peroxidation in rats was investiganted.The influence of three oils on rats were confirmed,.SD rats were divided into 7 groups by weight randomly: control group,low dose of peanut oil group(2.25g/kg),high dose of peanut oil group(11.25g/kg),low dose of rapeseed oil group(2.25g/kg),high dose of rapeseed oil group(11.25g/kg),low dose of soybeen oil group(2.25g/kg),and high dose of soybeen oil group(11.25g/kg).3 months later,bodyweight,organ coefficient,biochemical indexes and lipid peroxidation was investigated,part liver frozen saction was observed under light microscope.Results indicated: body weight of rats with high dose of peanut,rapeseed and soybeen oil were increased significantly compared with control group,bodyweight of rats with low peanut oil was also increased.Organ coefficient of liver in high soybeen oil group was higher than control group,organ coefficient of spleen in high soybeen oil group was decreased significantly.Organ coefficient of testis in low peanut oil group was increased,There were no differences of heart coefficient in any groups compared with control group.Biochemical indexes indicated: SOD was increased significantly in high dose of rapeseed oil group,AST in high rapeseed oil group was decreased significantly,TG in low peanut oil group and high soybean oil group was decreased significantly;HDL-C in low dose of rapeseed oil and soybean oil was higher than control group.Pathological test of liver slices did not have specific change with HE stain.There were effects on bodyweight and organs by over-taking peanut oil,rapeseed oil and soybean oil,but there was no evident damage or side-effect of all groups.

hX4eKM6Y.title: Identification and characterization of non-tuberculous mycobacteria isolated from tuberculosis suspects in Southern-central China.
hX4eKM6Y.abstract: The incidence of non-tuberculous mycobacteria (NTM)-related death has increased globally recently. To obtain information of the species and characterization of pathogens involved in NTM pulmonary infection in Southern-central China, we identified 160 non-tuberculous infection cases from 3995 acid-fast bacilli (AFB)-positive tuberculous suspects. We then randomly selected 101 non-tuberculous patients, isolated bacteria from their sputa and genotyped the pathogens using the 16S rRNA gene and 16S-23S rRNA internal transcribed spacer sequences. M. intracellulare (32.67%, 33/101), M. abscessus (32.67%, 33/101) and M. fortuitum (7.92%, 8/101) are identified in these isolates. Surprisingly, non-mycobacteria including Gordonia (8.91%, 9/101), Nocardia (5.94%, 6/101) and Tsukamurella (0.99%, 1/101) are also discovered, and the case of Tsukamurella pulmonis infection is first discovered in Southern-central China. Moreover, species of M. mucogenicum group, M. chubuense, M. kansasii, M. gastri, M. avium, M. porcinum and M. smegmatis are identified. In addition, nine immune compromised cases (8.91%, 9/101), including type two diabetes mellitus and HIV/AIDS are found to be infected with non-tuberculous bacteria. This study revealed the distribution and characteristics of non-tuberculous AFB pathogen infection occurred in Southern-central China, and suggested that physicians should be alert of the emerging of NTM and non-mycobacteria infection in AFB positive cases and take caution when choosing chemotherapy for tuberculosis-like pulmonary infections. Generally, this study may help with the development of new strategy for the diagnosis and treatment of mycobacterial infection.

fsmGY9A9.title: Development of a one-step immunochromatographic test strip for rapid detection of Sudan I residue in food
fsmGY9A9.abstract: A one-step immunochromatographic(IC) test strip for rapid detection of Sudan I was developed.Sudan I-gelatin immunogen was obtained via mixed acid anhydride method to couple SudanⅠderivative with gelatin.The immunoantigen was injected into new zealand white rabbit to prepare the anti-SudanⅠpolyclonal antibody.The 24.5 nm colloidal gold particles were prepared with the method of trisodium citrate reduction.Then the Sudan I-BSA antigen-colloidal gold compounds were made for test strip preparation.The results showed that the detection limit of the test strip was 15 μg/kg.There was no cross-reactivity was detected between Sudan I antibody and Sudan II,Sudan Ⅲ or Sudan Ⅳ.The results demonstrated there was no significant different between the results of IC strip and HPLC detection.With IC test strip,the SudanⅠresidue in food could be rapidly detected within 5 min,which was suitable for rapid testing on-site.

pqTSljKa.title: Identification and detection of Cordyceps sinensis with LAMP
pqTSljKa.abstract: Objective The method of loop-mediated isothermal amplification(LAMP) was employed to detect and identify Cordyceps sinensis rapidly.Methods Specific LAMP primers were designed according to the CS2 serine protease(csp2) gene of Cordyceps sinensis.C.sinensis DNA was extracted using CTAB method.The reaction conditions of LAMP were optimized.Specificity of LAMP reaction was validated by six different strains and using restriction enzyme Taq1 digested the LAMP products.Sensitivity of LAMP was tested with diluted C.sinensis solution with 10-fold gradient.LAMP products were shown by gel electrophoresis or adding SYBR Green I.Results The method of LAMP for detecting C.sinensis was effective and specific.The detection limit of LAMP assay was up to 6 pg/mL.Conclusion LAMP protocol is a promising method for the identification and detection of C.sinensis and Chinese materia medica as well.

9HmXPwa3.title: β-VLDL induced VLDL-R’s up-regulation via PKC-ERK1/2 signal pathway
9HmXPwa3.abstract:
Summary  To explore the intracellular signal pathways for β-VLDL induced very low density lipoprotein receptor (VLDL-R) transcription
 up-regulation and their effects on lipid accumulation in macrophages, Western Blot was used to examine phosphorylated ERK1/2
 protein and regulated effects by different singal kinase inhibitants. It was found that β-VLDL induced an increase in ERK1/2
 activity in a protein kinase C (PKC)-dependent manner in murine RAW264.7 macrophages. By using different protein kinases inhibotors
 or activators, it was observed that the effect of β-VLDL induced VLDL receptor transcription, which was monitored by RT-PCR
 analysis of VLDL receptor mRNA, was not affected by the inhibitor of p38 kinase and cAMP analog, but extremely abolished by
 pretreating cells with PD98059, an inhibitor of ERK and GF 109203 X, an inhibitor of PKC. These results demonstrated that
 the PKC-ERK1/2 cascade is the essential signaling pathway by which β-VLDL activated VLDL-R mRNA expression. Inhibition of
 the ERK1/2 signaling cascade resulted in suppression of the cellular lipid accumulation induced by β-VLDL in macrophages.

D7m5hT0a.title: The effect of perilla oil on anti-aging for aging model rats
D7m5hT0a.abstract: Objective: Study on the anti-aging effect of perilla oil on D-galactose induced aging model rats by the observation of physical ability, the ability of learning memory, antioxidant and lipid peroxidationindex, and research the anti-aging mechanism preliminarily. Methods: A total of 40 male SD rats of clean grade, 1 month old, were randomly divided into 5 groups. Negative control group, aging-model group, small dose perilla oil group (0.815 mL/kg), middle-dose perilla oil group (2.445 mL/kg), large-dose perilla oil group (7.337 mL/kg). Except for the negative control group were injected with saline, the remaining rats in each group in the subcutaneous injection of D galactose (125 mg/kg). After 8 weeks’ feeding, weight loading swimming test and Morris water maze experiment was carried out, then determine the content of superoxide dismutase (SOD), malondialdehyde (MDA), nitric oxide synthase (NOS) and nitric oxide (NO). Results: ompare with aging model group, the time of swimming in small-dose perilla oil treatment group, middle-dose perilla oil treatment group and large-dose perilla oil treatment group were longer (P<0.05); the escape latency of small-dose perilla oil treatment group, middle-dose perilla oil treatment group and large-dose perilla oil treatment group were less than model group (P<0.05); the effective time ratio in small-dose perilla oil treatment group, middle-dose perilla oil treatment group and large-dose perilla oil treatment group was higher than model group (P<0.05). The time of going through the platform in small- dose perilla oil treatment group had no difference. In middle-dose perilla oil treatment group and large- dose perilla oil treatment group, the effective time ratio and the time of going through the platform were remarkably higher than model group (P<0.05); compared with model group. In all groups the SOD activity was remarkably higher than model group. Conclusion: Successfully copy the D-galactose subacute aging model; Perilla oil can improve learning memory ability of D-galactose subacute aging model, increasing SOD activity and decreasing MDA content, indicating that Perilla oil have anti-aging effect. Perilla oil anti- aging efficiency was operated by reducing the blood free radicals.

cL0tCJhS.title: Comparison of different methods for purifying the rabbit antibody of Sudan Ⅰ IgG
cL0tCJhS.abstract: To compare the effects of caprylic acid-ammonium sulfate(CA-AS) method and affinity chromatography method for purifying the rabbit anti-Sudan I IgG.The purified products were tested in the protein content,relative molecular weight,and immune titer by BCA method,agar gel precipitation(AGP) assay,sodium dodecyl sulfate polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis(SDS-PAGE).The results show that the protein content of purified antibody by CA-AS is higher than that by the affinity chromatography method,but the purity and titer with affinity chromatography method are both higher than that with AS method.Therefore,the affinity chromatography method is a rapid and efficient method for antibody purification.The purified products are suitable for the study of immunology test method,and establish a better groundwork for the rapid detection for Sudan I in food in the future.

1uf8mBPl.title: Development of A One-step Immunochromatographic Strip Test for Rapid Detection of Chlortetracycline Residue in Food
1uf8mBPl.abstract: An immunochromatographic strip test was developed to detect chlortetracycline residue in food using immune colloidal gold technique. Chlortetracycline immuno-antigen (CTC-BSA) was prepared by conjugating chlortetracycline to bovine serum albumin via glutaraldehyde, and injected into rabbits to prepare anti-CTC polyclonal antibody. The resulted anti- CTC antibody was purified, and its titer and specificity was determined by indirect enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA). Subsequently, colloidal gold particles 15 nm in size were prepared by the method of trisodium citrate reduction. The purified anti-CTC antibody was finally conjugated to colloidal gold particles served as a detection reagent to pack the immunochromatographic (IC) strip. A positive reaction gave a visual color to assess the residue level of CTC. Results suggested that the limit of quantification of CTC was 0.7 μg/mL. Cross-reactivity could not be observed till the concentration of tetracycline was higher than 1 μg/mL. Chlortetracycline content obtained with the IC strips provided a positive correlation with that obtained by HPLC method. Using this method, the analysis of CTC in food could be completed within less than 5 min.

tOvXu4BF.title: Rapid Detection of Enterobacter sakazakii by LAMP
tOvXu4BF.abstract: Objective: To develop a loop-mediated isothermal amplification (LAMP) method for rapid detection of Enterobacter sakazakii in food. Methods: LAMP primers were designed on the basis of 16S rRNA gene (16S rDNA) and outer membrane protein A gene (OmpA) in Enterobacter sakazakii. The LAMP products were evaluated by electrophoresis or SYBR-GREEN I. Results: The detection limit of Enterobacter sakazakii by LAMP assay was 32 CFU/mL using 16S rRNA primers or 3 CFU/mL using OmpA primers. The similar detection sensitivity of LAMP products using SYBR-GREEN I and electrophoresis was observed. Conclusion: LAMP method was effective and sensitive for rapidly detecting Enterobacter sakazakii, which will have a broad application prospect in food.

XuhzENA4.title: CLONING AND EXPRESSION OF VERY LOW DENSITY LIPOPROTEIN RECEPTOR FRAGMENTS WITH BINDING FUNCTION
XuhzENA4.abstract: The purpose of the paper is to build a module of small molecular receptor fragments charactering normal VLDL-R binding function and study the mechanism of VLDL-R binding to ligand.The genes of LBR1-3 and LBR1-8 were amplified by PCR and the products were inserted into plasmid pET28a(+) seperately.The recombinant plasmids were transformed into competent E.coli strain: Rosetta.Recombinant proteins were induced by IPTG.The fusion proteins were purified of Ni+-NTA chromatography.These results lay the foundation of the receptor's structure and application study,especially for its ligand recognition and binding characteristic.

kW7MY6tR.title: FRESH PRESERVATION STUDY ON ZEIN FILM COATINGS
kW7MY6tR.abstract: This paper does research on the condition of zein film formation and its fresh preservation effect.Zein was extracted from corn gluten meal.The best condition of zein film formation was studied by single factor analysis method.The fresh preservation effect of zein film to sliced apples was also observed.The results showed that optimal film formation condition was that the ratio of zein to 80% ethanol was 1∶10.The properties of transparency,waterproofing and antioxidation of zein film were greatly improved by adding glycerol and citrate acid.

LK04jatV.title: Preparation and Validation of Tetracycline Polyclonal Antibodies and Primary Detection via ELISA
LK04jatV.abstract: Tetracycline-BSA immunoantigens(TC-BSA)were prepared via giutaraldehyde method and succinic acid method,then the different immunoantigens were injected into rabbits in order to prepare different polyclonal antibodies.The special antibody of Tetracycline(TC)was identified by indirect enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay(ELISA).It was proved that the working concentration of the two kinds of the special antibodies was 1:320 000,the Tetracycline(TC)inhibition concentration(IC50)was 92.6 μg/mL,the detection limit was 6.25 ng/mL,the cross-reaction rate between Tetracycline(TC)and Chlortetracycline(CTC)was 78%,which acted as an useful foundation for the detection of this kind of antibiotic residue in food by test strip.

Ouhfxakg.title: Up-regulation of VLDL receptor expression and its signaling pathway induced by VLDL and beta-VLDL.
Ouhfxakg.abstract: Very low density lipoprotein receptor (VLDLR) is thought to participate in the pathogenesis of atherosclerosis induced by VLDL and beta-VLDL. The present study was undertaken to elucidate the effects of VLDL and beta-VLDL on VLDLR expression and its signaling pathway. RAW264.7 cells were incubated with VLDL and beta-VLDL. The expression of VLDLR mRNA was detected by RT-PCR. The transcriptional activity of VLDLR gene was detected in recombinant plasmid pGL4.2VR-luciferase transfected RAW264.7. Western blot assay was used to detect the changes of phosphorylated ERK1/2 protein. Inhibitors or activators were used to observe the signal pathway involving VLDLR expression regulation. The results showed that VLDL and beta-VLDL stimulated ERK1/2 activity in a PKC-dependent manner. VLDL or beta-VLDL-induced VLDLR expression on macrophages was extremely abolished by inhibitors ERK1/2 or PKC. Our findings revealed that VLDL or beta-VLDL-induced VLDLR expression via PKC/ERK cascades and the effect was linked to the transcriptional activation of VLDLR gene promoter.

8MNbRAbK.title: Exploration of the Application of Research-based Teaching in Plant Biology Teaching
8MNbRAbK.abstract: Research-based teaching is one of the important ways of college teaching reform at present, and is an important means of developing students' scientific research and innovation ability. In the study, research-based teaching was firstly introduced to plant biology teaching and a set of reasonable evaluation mechanism was established on the basis of teaching effects. The results showed that students' learning interest, learning ability and academic records for plant Biology had greater improvements than before. The teaching mode can be promoted in basic special course of biology majors.

u66ziykK.title: Cloning and expression of apolipoprotein E3 and its variant apoE2 and apoE4.
u66ziykK.abstract: In order to obtain three isoforms of apolipoprotein E (apoE), the cDNA encoding apoE3 was obtained by RT-PCR from normal human liver tissue. Site-directed mutagenesis was used to obtain the cDNAs encoding apoE2 and apoE4 isoforms. The 3 cDNAs were subcloned into vector pGEM-3Z and verified by DNA sequencing. The expression recombinant which can express the target protein as a (His) 6-tagged fusion was constructed by subcloning apoE cDNA into vector pT7-PL. The purified proteins were gained by Ni-NTA column. The SDS-PAGE results revealed the 6 His fusion proteins (apoE2, apoE3 and apoE4) were correctly expressed and purified successfully.

NEzIPmGr.title: Beta-VLDL induced VLDL-R's up-regulation via PKC-ERK1/2 signal pathway.
NEzIPmGr.abstract: To explore the intracellular signal pathways for beta-VLDL induced very low density lipoprotein receptor (VLDL-R) transcription up-regulation and their effects on lipid accumulation in macrophages, Western Blot was used to examine phosphorylated ERK1/2 protein and regulated effects by different singal kinase inhibitants. It was found that beta-VLDL induced an increase in ERK1/2 activity in a protein kinase C (PKC)-dependent manner in murine RAW264.7 macrophages. By using different protein kinases inhibitors or activators, it was observed that the effect of beta-VLDL induced VLDL receptor transcription, which was monitored by RT-PCR analysis of VLDL receptor mRNA, was not affected by the inhibitor of p38 kinase and cAMP analog, but extremely abolished by pretreating cells with PD98059, an inhibitor of ERK and GF 109203X, an inhibitor of PKC. These results demonstrated that the PKC-ERK1/2 cascade is the essential signaling pathway by which beta-VLDL activated VLDL-R mRNA expression. Inhibition of the ERK1/2 signaling cascade resulted in suppression of the cellular lipid accumulation induced by beta-VLDL in macrophages.

l4CrSm4n.title: The Inhibitory Effect of MCT in Different Concentration with DTT on Amplification of PrP~(sc) by PMCA in vitro
l4CrSm4n.abstract: Protein misfolding cyclic amplification(PMCA) technology simulates the amplification of scrapie prion protein(PrPsc) in vitro and be used for the screening of the drug which inhibits the conversion of cellular prion protein(PrPc) to PrPsc.In this study,the PMCA was successfully established according to the method reported by Saborio et al and further optimized.By the optimal PMCA technology,it was found that mechlorethamine(MCT) and dithiothreitol(DTT) inhibited the conversion of PrPc to PrPsc in vitro and showed a significant dose-dependent effect.By antibodies binding with different domains of PrPc,it was found that epitope of antibody 6H4 was concealed after treatment by MCT with DTT.The epitope of antibody 6H4 is in the first helix domain of PrPc,where the conformation conversion from PrPc to PrPsc takes place.Further research on the mechanism will benefit the development for new drug for transmissible spongiform encephalopathy(TSE).

K5j2u8Zs.title: Cholesterol overloading leads to hepatic L02 cell damage through activation of the unfolded protein response
K5j2u8Zs.abstract: Reported data indicate that cholesterol loading in the liver can cause hepatic injury. To explore the possible mechanisms of cell damage resulting from cholesterol overloading in hepatocytes, cell apoptosis, the unfolded protein response (UPR) and the correlation between them were assessed in the cholesterol-overloaded normal human hepatic cell line L02. L02 cells were incubated with 200 microg/ ml of low density lipoprotein (LDL) for 24 h with or without 20 microg/ml 58035, an inhibitor of acyl-CoA:cholesterol acyltransferase (ACAT). In the LDL+58035 group, the intracellular cholesterol level was dramatically increased, which was measured by an enzymatic combined high performance liquid chromatography assay. Expression of immunoglobulin-binding protein, X-box binding protein 1, activating transcription factor 6, activating transcription factor 4, CCAAT/enhancer-binding protein homologous protein-10, markers of endoplasmic reticulum stress (ERS)/ UPR, were up-regulated as determined using reverse transcription-polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) or Western blot analysis. The rate of cell apoptic death increased 21.3+/-2.4%. Meanwhile, the active caspase-3 protein expression was increased 8.4-fold compared to the active caspase-3 protein expression in the controls. Furthermore, 4-phenylbutyric acid, an inhibitor of UPR, partly reduced cell apoptosis and activation of caspase-3. This study suggests that cholesterol overloading in hepatic L02 cells induces ERS and activates the UPR which, in part, leads to the apoptotic damage of cells.

ee5hiwjS.title: Effect of Statins on the Expression of Two VLDL Receptor Subtypes
ee5hiwjS.abstract: Objective To examine the effect of Statins on the expression of two very low density lipoprotein(VLDL) receptor subtypes.Methods In vitro,moderately-or poorly-differentiated human gastric adenocarcinoma cell line SGC7901 was incubated with the definite concentration of Statins for different periods;In vivo,the rabbits were fed with the definite dose of Statins for different periods,and the expression of two VLDL receptor subtypes was detected in SGC7901 and tissue of rabbits by reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction(RT-PCR) and Western blot techniques.Results Statins could up-regulate the mRNA and protein expression of VLDL receptor subtypes in SGC7901 and adipose tissue,but no significant changes were observed in other tissues of rabbits.Conclusion Statins maybe eliminate the triglyceride of blood by upregulating the expression of VLDL receptor in adipose tissue.

uhyphA2H.title: Effect of walnut oil,perilla oil,α-linolenic acid and linoleic acid supplementation on rats spatial learning and memory ability
uhyphA2H.abstract: To investigate the effects of walnut oil,perilla oil,α-linolenic acid and linoleic acid on the spatial learning and memory ability of weaned rats during development period and explore their work mechanism,a total of 78 neonatal male SD rats,4 weeks old,were randomly divided into 13 groups according to the method of random digits table:negative control group;low,middle,high dose group of walnut oil(1.1,2.2,11 g/(kg·d));low,middle,high dose group of perilla oil(1.1,2.2,11 g/(kg·d));low,middle,high dose group of α-linolenic acid(0.1,0.2,1.0 g/(kg·d));low,middle,high dose group of linoleic acid(0.1,0.2,1.0 g/(kg·d)).After 4 weeks feed,the spatial learning and memory ability were tested by Morris water maze test,and the enzyme activity of acetylcholinesterase(AChE),nitric oxide synthase(NOS),superoxide dismutase(SOD),and the content of malondialdehyde(MDA) in the brain tissue of rats were determined.The Morris water maze test showed that,compared with negative control group,the escape latency detected in middle,high dose group of walnut oil and low,middle(P<0.05),high(P<0.01)dose group of perilla oil decreased significantly;the times of striding over platform tested in middle,high dose group of walnut oil and middle dose group of perilla oil increased significantly(P<0.05).The activity of AChE in brain tissue of rats fed with middle,high dose group of walnut oil increased significantly(P<0.05),the activity of SOD increased significantly in high dose group of perilla oil and high dose group of α-linolenic acid(P<0.05).MDA content in middle,high dose group of perilla oil was lower than the negative control group(P<0.05).During development period of weaned rats,adding walnut oil or perilla oil could promote the ability of spatial learning and memory,and simply adding α-linolenic acid,linoleic acid could not take similar effect.

gexuc5RR.title: Activity Detection and Structure Analysis of ACE Inhibitors Derived from Rice Bran Protein
gexuc5RR.abstract: To get the structure and function information about ACEI(angiotensin coverting enzyme) inhibitors derived from food protein. The present study prepared ACEI inhibitors from rice bran. The method of isoelectric point (PI) precipitation was adopted to obtain rice bran protein, which was hydrolyzed by pepsin, trypsin, and papain individually or jointly. The hydrolyzed products were separated according to the differences of molecular weights by Sephadex G-15 gel chromatogram. The components with the highest ACE inhibitor activity measured by FAPGG methods, were separated further by SP-Sephadex C- 25. HPLC-MS analysis showed that the highest inhibiting activity comes from pepsin-trypsin digested components, which containing short peptides such as Arg-Tyr, Met-Trp, Gly-Val-Tyr or Gly-Asp-Phe with the common characteristics of phenyl ring-like structure which maybe the important structural charecteristics.

Ax8SQKuP.title: Effect of DHA supplementation during development on rats spatial learning and memory ability
Ax8SQKuP.abstract: To investigate the effects of dietary supplementation of DHA oil during development of rats on the spatial learning and memory ability,a total of 144 neonatal male SD rats(1 month old) were randomly divided into 6 groups according to the method of random digits table: negative control group fed normal feed,negative control group fed essential fatty acid-deficient feed,positive control group(Piracetam 400 mg/(kg·d)),low,middle and high dose of DHA group(150,300,600 mg/(kg·d)),twenty-four rats in each group.After 4 weeks,8 weeks and 12 weeks of administration respectively,the spatial learning and memory ability were detected by Morris water maze test,and after that the level of total protein,acetylcholinesterase(AChE),superoxide dismutase(SOD),malondialdehyde(MDA) in the brain tissue of rats and blood routine were determined.In the Morris water maze test,at 8 weeks of administration,compared with negative control group,the escape latency decreased significantly(P<0.05) in positive control group and middle dose of DHA group,the ratio of the effective time and the number of crossing-platform increased significantly(P<0.05).At 12 weeks of administration,compared with negative control group,the escape latency increased significantly(P<0.01) in high dose of DHA group,MDA content of brain increased significantly(P<0.05),the activity of SOD decreased significantly(P<0.05),and there was no statistical significance among the other groups about the indexes of AChE,SOD,MDA.The research showed that supplementation of DHA during development of rats improving the spatial learning and memory ability had significant dose-effect and time-effect relationship.Supplementation of large dose of DHA for long time during development of rats could reduce the spatial learning and memory ability.

jjiStL8i.title: Cloning,Expression and Function of Protein G IgG Fc Binding Domain
jjiStL8i.abstract: It was to clone and express protein G IgG Fc binding domain(PGFB)for purifying antibody.Four oligonucleotide fragments with the selected E.coli-preferred codon were designed and synthesized according to the amino acid sequence of PGFB.Then the gene of PGFB was synthesized by overlap extension PCR,and cloned into pET-28a-c(+) plasmid.The recombinant protein was purified by a single step affinity chromatography with Ni+-NTA,then it was coupled with Sepharose 6B to purify polyclonal antibody.Results showed PGFB was expressed highly in E.coli BL21(DE3),the purity of which reached 90% with expected molecular weight of 12.25 kD.PGFB coupled with Sepharose 6B which can purify polyclonal antibody.The binding capacity reached 20 mg/mL.Therefore,highly expressed PGFB would provide convenience for the rapid purification of polyclonal antibody.
keywords: Protein G IgG Fc binding domain Polyclonal antibody Prokaryotic expression

nnFMVA84.title: Inflammation and nonalcoholic fatty liver disease
nnFMVA84.abstract: Nonalcoholic fatty liver disease( NAFLD) is one of the most common clinical liver disease,and its path- ogenesis has not yet been fully elucidated. It is believed that insulin resistance( IR),oxidative stress and endo- plasmic reticulum stress( ERS) plays an important role in the progress of NAFLD. Yet,inflammation throughout the whole progression of NAFLD,so,inflammatory response affects NAFLD through IR,oxidative stress and ERS is reviewed.

4VmESu34.title: Detection of Salmonella enteritidis by loop-mediated isothermal amplification
4VmESu34.abstract: To detect Salmonella enteritidis rapidly,loop-mediated isothermal amplification(LAMP) method was developed.According to Salmonella enteritidis serotype specific gene lygD,LAMP inner and outer primer sets were designed.Specificity of LAMP primers were validated by assaying 10 different strains.Sensitivity of LAMP method was evaluated by serial gradient dilution of Salmonella enteritidis solution.LAMP used for the detection of egg samples.The detection limits of LAMP assay were 2.33×101cfu/ml for pure cultures and 2.67×101cfu/ml for analogy egg samples.LAMP method is a simple,rapid and feasible method for the detection of Salmonella enteritidis.

zLZUL5bS.title: Dot Immunogold Filtration Assay for Rapid Detection of Chlortetracycline Residue in Meat
zLZUL5bS.abstract: A rapid detection method for chlortetracycline (CTC) was developed by dot immunogold filtration assay (DIGFA). The anti-CTC antibody was coated onto nitrocellulose membrane to capture gold-labeled CTC-BSA conjugate and CTC in samples. Positive or negative can be identified by shade of a visible red dot. Results showed that the detection limit is 0.4μg/ml. Quantitative analysis of CTC can be achieved between 0.6μg/ml and 1μg/ml. There is a good correlation of detection results between the method and ELISA with correlation coefficient of 0.970. DIGFA can be applied to detect the CTC residue in meat rapidly.

BHxBt3HL.title: Research progress of n-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids and the endoplasmic reticulum stress in non-alcoholic fatty liver disease
BHxBt3HL.abstract: Non-alcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD) is a worldwide public health problem.The underlying causes of NAFLD are unclear.Endoplasmic reticulum is the main site of protein processing,lipid synthesis and storage of calcium.Disruption of Endoplasmic reticulum homeostasis,which often induces endoplasmic reticulum stress (ERS),plays an important regulatory role in lipid metabolism and cell function.Recent evidence implicated the ERS in both the development of steatosis and progression to nonalcoholic steatohepatitis.In the current review,we discussed the involvement of different fatty acids in the pathogenesis of NAFLD with particular emphasis on the role of ERS,explored the mechanism of n-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids in the prevention and treatment of NAFLD.

MrG8ifBc.title: Preparation and purification of a great amount of monoclonal antibodies against the c-terminal of very low density lipoprotein receptor
MrG8ifBc.abstract: Background: Very low density lipoprotein receptor is regarded as a Swiss Army Knife receptor, and many researchers have studied this receptor. But there are only several kinds of commercial antibodies and the price is on the high side. Objective: To get the monoclonal antibody against the c-terminal of very low density lipoprotein receptor for the future study. Methods: In order to obtain the very low density lipoprotein receptor, hybridoma IgG 6A6 cells related with very low density lipoprotein receptor intracellular domain was injected into peritoneal of Balb/c mice. After 2 weeks, ascites was collected, and the target protein was preliminary purified by salting-out method (n-octanoic acid-saturated ammonium sulfate precipitation method) and further purified by affinity chromatography, and the monoclonal antibody related with very low density lipoprotein receptor intracellular domain was obtained. The relative molecular mass and purity were detected by sodium dodecyl sulfate polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis, and the activity was detected by enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay. Results and Conclusion: Western Blotting results showed that the antibody from the ascites directly can bind the very low density lipoprotein receptor protein, but the background was not clear. The purified antibody from the ascites through salting-out method (n-octanoic acid-saturated ammonium sulfate precipitation method) and then by protein A affinity chromatography can bind specifically with the very low density lipoprotein receptor. The pure and activity monoclonal antibodies can be obtained through purification by the salting-out method and Protein A Agarose.

KlxXnMQq.title: Molecular Mechanism of DHA for Improving Learning and Memory in Rats
KlxXnMQq.abstract: This study was aimed to investigate the effect of docosahexaenoic acid on learning and memory abilities in rats and to explore the relevant molecular mechanism. A total of 32 neonatal male SD rats were randomly divided into 4 groups: negative control group, positive control group, low(370 mg/(kg · d)) and high dose DHA group(740 mg/(kg · d)). After 8 weeks of feeding, the enzyme activities of acetylcholinesterase(AChE) and nitric oxide synthase(NOS) in brain tissue of rats were analyzed. The mRNA expressions of N-methylD-aspartate receptor subunit(NR1), cAMP responsive element binding protein( CERB), immediate early gene( c-fos) in the hippocampus of rats were determined by RT-PCR. Results showed that compared to the negative control group, DHA at both doses was able to significantly increase AChE and NOS activities in brain tissue as well as the mRNA expression levels of NR1, CREB and c-fos while the low dose presented higher effect. In summary, DHA could remarkably improve learning and memory abilities in rats in a dose-dependent manner. The mechanism might be involved with the upregulation of NR1, CREB and c-fos mRNA expression by DHA in the hippocampus of rats.

hvNmshnU.title: THE OBSERVATION ON LIPID-LOWERING EFFECT OF PIG BLOOD
hvNmshnU.abstract: The paper studies the effects of pig blood on experimental rats with hyerlipidemia.Method:Rats were randomly divided into four groups:I,control group;II,high-fat diet;III,pig blood insoluble residue;IV,pig blood extract.Group III fed high-fat diet added pig blood insoluble residue.Group IV fed high-fat diet and drink pig blood extract instead of water.Total serum cholesterol(TC),total triglyeride(TG) were determined after 10 days,20 days,and the weight of the rats were weighed up every 4 days.Result:The concentrations of TC,TG in serum of Group III and IV were decreased significantly compared with Group Ⅱ(P<0.05),and the weight of the rat was obviously decreased in the meantime.Conclusion:pig blood has potential possibility to be used as natural food for preventing the blood lipid raising.

CxppF2pT.abstract: Ecology is the comprehensive science to study the relationship between organism and environment, which is the important specialized course for the major of biology. The curriculum content of ecology course in engineering colleges was optimized in order to satisfy the demand of the deepening of teaching reform and the development of subjects and promote teaching and improve students′ comprehensive quality.

U27v2JPH.title: Comparative Study on the Physical and Chemical Characteristics of Tributaries of Xiangxi River in the Three Gorges Reservoir after Releasing Filter-Feeding Fish
U27v2JPH.abstract: From April 2010 to November 2012,the physical and chemical characteristics of a tributary of Xiangxi river before and after releasing 14 680 000 filter-feeding fishes by 7 batches,and the monitoring data before and after releasing fish fry were studied.The results showed that content of TN,NH4-N,NO2-N,NO3-N,TP,PO4-P,COD,chlorophyll a after the fish releasing was significantly lower than before.The value before fish releasing was 3.10 mg / L,0.421 mg / L,0.048 mg / L,2.869 mg / L,0.549 mg / L,0.299 mg / L,16.563 mg / L,26.447 mg / m3;after releasing was 2.20 mg / L,0.065 mg / L,0.022 mg / L,1.643 mg / L,0.495 mg / L,0.155 mg / L,10.465 mg / L,6.608 mg / m3.The nutrition TSIM before and after releasing was 67.0 and 56.4,respectively.The tributary of Xiangxi river was mild eutrophication(TLI> 53).For ecological restoration and controling the water bloom,filter-feeding fish fry should be released to the tributaries of Xiangxi river every year.

qgKoxnrT.title: Effect of five kinds of oils on spatial learning and memory ability,lipid peroxidation and serum lipid level in rats
qgKoxnrT.abstract: The effects of five kinds of oils on spatial learning and memory ability,lipid peroxidation and serum lipid level in rats were investigated.A total of eighty-eight neonatal SD rats were randomly divided into eleven groups,eight rats in each group.DHA oil,perilla oil,walnut oil,peanut oil and rapeseed oil were divided into two doses of groups,2.445 mL/kg and 8.15 mL/kg.Negative control group was independently designed.The samples were poured into stomach through mouth,keeping for thirty days.After that,the spatial learning and memory ability were detected by Morris water maze test,and then the biochemical indexes of brain tissue and serum of rats were determined.The results showed that compared with negative control group,the escape latency decreased significantly(P<0.05,P<0.01) in perilla oil and walnut oil groups;the activity of acetylcho-linesterase(AChE) decreased significantly(P<0.01,P<0.05) in high dose group of perilla oil and walnut oil;the activity of superoxide dismutase(SOD) increased significantly in high dose group of perilla oil and rapeseed oil,and peanut oil group.The activity of SOD and malondialdehyde(MDA) content increased significantly in high dose group of DHA oil,total cholesterol content decreased significantly in low and high dose groups of DHA oil,and the activity of glutamic-pyruvic transaminase(ALT) increased significantly in low and high dose groups of peanut oil.Supplementation of perilla oil and walnut oil could improve the spatial learning and memory ability of rats.Perilla oil,peanut oil and rapeseed oil had antioxidant activity.DHA oil could decrease serum lipid,but supplementation of large dose of DHA oil could cause elevation of liver lipid peroxidation.Peanut oil could cause ALT abnormal.

AWax8WCI.title: The Study on the Preparation of Sodium Cholate Polyclonal Antibody and its Fast Determination Method
AWax8WCI.abstract: Objective:To develop colloidal gold immunochromatographic(IC) method for rapidly detecting the concentration of Sodium Cholate.Methods: Sodium Cholate-BSA immunogen was obtained via carbodiimide method.Then the immunoantigen was injected into New Zealand rabbits to prepare the anti-sodium cholate polyclona antibody according to routine immunity procedure.The specific antibody of Bile acid natrium was identified by indirect enzyme linked immunosorbent assay(ELISA).Results: The sodium cholate-OVA antigen-colloidal gold compounds were made for test strip preparation.It was proved that the specificity of the antibody was 1 ∶ 80 000,and the detectability was 12 μg/mL by the method.Conclusion: Accordingly,IC test strip method is effective and sensitive for rapidly detecting sodium cholate,which will probably have a broad clinical application prospect.

Xz2zObad.title: Study on Akebia saponin D repairing PC12 cells line injured by Aβ_(25-35)
Xz2zObad.abstract: OBJECTIVE To study Akebia saponin D repairing the damage of PC12 cell line by Aβ25-35 and its effects on A2M and ECE2 gene expression level.METHODS MTT was used to analyze the repairing effects of Akebia saponin D on PC12 cell line damaged by Aβ25-35;RT-qPCR was used to measure Akebia saponin D influencing on A2M and ECE2 genes expression level.RESULTS At the concentration of Aβ25-35 15 μmol·L-1,the inhibition on PC12 cell line was significant after various treatment time of 6 h,12 h,24 h,and 48 h(P<0.01).After 16 h,Akebia saponin D could efficiently protect PC12 cells against Aβ25-35-induced cytotoxicity and prevent from the loss of cell viability,and it had the highest percentage of proliferation after 24 h(P<0.01).Compared to control group,the expression levels of ECE2 and A2M mRNAs were strikingly higher in the model group.ECE2 mRNA and A2M mRNA in PC12 cell treated with Akebia saponin D were obviously down-regulated.CONCLUSION Akebia saponin D can repair the damage of PC12 cell line by Aβ25-35,and it may be function through the down-regulation of genes ECE2 and A2M.

PGeJbBS2.title: Effects of Defatted Walnut Meal on Learning and Memory Ability and Antioxidant Capacity of Rats
PGeJbBS2.abstract: Objective: To explore the effect of defatted walnut meal on learning and memory ability and antioxidant capacity in rats and its corresponding mechanisms. Methods: Totally 64 rats were randomly divided into eight groups: normal feed group, defatted soybean meal(2.5 g/(kg · d)) group, walnut oil(2.5 mL/(kg · d)) group, walnut(3.0 g/(kg · d))) group and defatted walnut meal groups at doses of 1.0, 2.0, 3.0 g/(kg · d) and 4.0 g/(kg · d). Following continuous feeding for 60 days, Step-down and Morris water maze tests were used to evaluate the learning and memory ability of rats. The contents of superoxide dismutase(SOD), malondialdehyde(MDA), acetylcholinesterase(AChE) and nitric oxide synthase(NOS) in brain tissues of rats were determined. Results: Moderate consumption of defatted walnut meal could greatly improve the performance of Step-down and Morris water maze tests, increase the activities of SOD and AChE in brain tissues of rats and reduce MDA level. Conclusion: Defatted walnut meal can obviously improve the learning and memory abilities and antioxidant capacity of rats.

Oj3SVGnO.title: Study on Absorption of Zein to Ethanol
Oj3SVGnO.abstract: Zein was prepared by organic solvent extraction.The change of ethanol concentration was measured by alcoholmeter before and after absorption of zein.The single factor analysis was adapted to determining the optiomal conditions such as pH,temperature,ethanol concentration and ratio of liquid to solid.The results showed that there is the maximum ethanol adsorption under the conditions of ethanol concentration 30%,ratio of liquid to solid 1:10,20 ℃ and pH 6.The results lay a foundation for using zein to reduce alcohol concentration.

KUv1iDyN.abstract: Coal exploitation produces a great deal of environment pollution and ecological degradation in northern Shaanxi area.This research calculated the economic damages of air pollution,water pollution,solid material pollution on environment and also the economic damage of the shortage of water resources,water and soil loss,and vegetation destruction.We expressed different damage in money form to evaluate the influence on biogeocenose and environment during coal exploitation in northern Shaanxi area.

VsT9Nt9Z.title: An Game Analysis on Inter-regional Environmental Conservation in China
VsT9Nt9Z.abstract: Since it has the characteristic of public goods,the costs and benefits of environmental conservation,such as returning crop plots to forests,returning pasturage to grass and returning plowland to lake are undertaken by different regions. As this aggravates the inequity and benefit conflicts between regions,inter-regional environmental conservation has become the bottle neck of sustainable development in our country.By using a game model we found that the region with high income will respond in the environmental conservation and the region with low income will reap where he has not sown.So the conclusion is that we should raise people's income in environmental conservation and establish inter-regional environmental compensation mechanism to solve the embarrassment of inter-regional environmental conservation in our country.

bKMGXkSB.abstract: This paper analyzes the scientific and sustainable components of the price of mineral energy resources,which are resource costs,production costs and external costs.We also discuss the characteristics of the current mineral energy resources pricing mechanism in China and the pricing experience in developed countries.At last,we give some suggestions on reformation of mineral energy resources pricing mechanism,considering market supply demand relations,the degree of resource scarcity,and international advanced experience on mineral energy resources pricing.

gndFD2ej.title: A Hardware Design of a Low Power Consumption Network Fault Diagnosis Device Based on S3C2440A
gndFD2ej.abstract: Network fault diagnosis devices are used to diagnose the devices which lose connecting network function under the field environment.Due to the restriction of the filed environment,the battery is used as the power of devices.The operation time of battery of the device must be prolonged.Aiming at the network fault diagnosis device based on S3C2440A and considering the concept of low power consumption and other factors,the power supply by using the module and dynamic switching of CPU's working mode is used to reduce the total power consumption of the device thus prolonging the working time of the network fault diagnosis.

eOc6wuAE.abstract: In the automated command systems,the fixed structure model of decision-making organizations has such issues as multi-dimension,complexity,long exploiting cycle and huge costs.Simulation technology can provide a shortcut for solving above problems,and simulation modeling technology provides safeguards for the effective implementation of simulation.On the basis of in-depth analysis of the fixed structure model of decision-making organizations existed,a modeling method is presented based on the combination of the grid theory and two-stage generation.The method is more suitable for the description of the system states changing with the characteristics of transformation in the different abstract levels,which can improve the efficiency of systems designing greatly.
keywords: fixed structure model of decision-making organizations

uy4ldeYT.title: Negative Trickle-down:Economic Growth and Inequality of Income Distribution
uy4ldeYT.abstract: Negative trickle-down effect mean that wealth is accumulated to the top,at the same time,the lower-middle income group is deteriorated. The idea of a positive trickle down had validity during the 1950s through the mid 1970s. Since1980s,the developed capitalist countries have changed dramatically,distribution of wages,income and wealth became more inequality. The negative trickle-down effect is caused by the ratchet effect on consumption,deformity development of housing market,less Public Sector Goods and Services. There is Negative trickle-down effect in our country. But it is because of the unreasonable institution arrangement. Negative trickle-down effect marked that the failure of new liberalism. It is necessary to improve income distribution by state intervention.
uy4ldeYT.venue: Journal of Nanjing University of Finance and Economics

G6pS7xuG.abstract: Communication among people is the basic theme in Forster's novels. In Forster's masterpiece A Passage to India, by narrating two women's travel to India, he expresses different people's eagerness for love, indicates the complicated process and various difficulties in communication, and then points out that it is a common goal for every nation in the world to create the opportunities and narrow the gaps.

qdow3E5e.title: Effect of soil sample preparation on free swelling ratio and its improved measures
qdow3E5e.abstract: Free swelling ratio is a significant index for classification of expansive soil and identification of swelling potential. Unfortunately it is influenced by many factors, among which the effect of soil sample preparation is discussed. Test researches show that soil sampling mass and test results is of little influence by three funnel bores (4.5, 5, 5.5 mm) and three drop heights (5, 10, 15 mm) while they are much influenced by degree of grinding of soil. The specified standard that soil particle size is less than 0.5 mm is not perfect and the results of free swelling ratio for three soil particle sizes (0.25-0.5, 0.1-0.25, <0.1 mm) is widely variable, it is discovered that the finest soil (<0.1 mm) is reduced by 30%-45% and isn't consistent with other indexes for expansive soil classification. The contrast is studied and mass difference of particle up to 2 g measured by a cup of 10 ml is found; the conclusion that the results is influenced by particle mass is established and the changing of structure is a possible reason. At last the particle size between 0.1 mm and 0.5 mm is suggested.

wAIvFzI1.title: Application of Geologic Analytic Method in Karst Cave Exploration
wAIvFzI1.abstract: The karst geological disaster is a common geological one,which often causes significant economic losses and casualties in the process of the tunnel excavation in the carbonate rock area.The geologic analytic method is a basic method of geologic prediction during the tunnel construction and it is also the basis of all the geologic prediction by the geophysical exploration methods during the tunnel construction.In this paper,associated with the concrete practice of engineering and based on the summary of the conditions and regularity of the karst development in the carbonate rock development area,the lithology,structure of rocks,topography,the additional karst development and so on are investigating and analysising by geologic analytic method in the Jie-shang tunnel of the Bidu section of the Hangrui highway,then the key regions of the karst development which are proved in the actual excavation are got.

r9FcwTVW.title: The Method of Anti-analysis in the Treatment of Landslide
r9FcwTVW.abstract: The procedure of landslide is taken as a large site test by the mothod of anti-analysis,and the whole landslide mass are considered as the object of the shear test.By calculating of anti-analysis,the rational strength parameters of the slip plane are determined.The case study shows that the shortcomings of site test are overcomed by the mothed of anti-analysis,which is hard to accomplish.And it is reliable in the analysis of landslide stability.

Ca9nQFk5.title: Research on very-high frequency electromagnetic wave multi-parameter tomography technology and its application
Ca9nQFk5.abstract: Applying electromagnetic wave velocity singly for karst survey,there are limilations because of multiple solutions,and so does attenuation tomography technology.And the veracity is reduced.Based on the electric differences between karst cave and ambient medium,which are directly reflected by resistivity and relative dielectric constant,theories of resistivity and relative dielectric constant tomography are put forward,depending on the theories of electromagnetic wave velocity and attenuation tomography.Furthermore,it is applied to project.It is proved that the technology,relying on resistivity of electromagnetic wave and tomography of relative dielectric constant,is doable by analyzing four parameters,such as electromagnetic wave velocity,attenuation,relative dielectric constant and resistivity.A method of multi-parameter tomography compositive analysis is formed.As a result,the veracity of applying tomography by electromagnetic wave for detecting karst cave and it's filling increases.

eToj3R48.title: Application of Comprehensive Physical Exploration for Engineering Geological Prospecting of Highway in Karst Area
eToj3R48.abstract: Focusing on the multi-solution problems of the physical exploration in the karst area highway reconnaissance,the karst area of Zhenning to Shengjingguan highway K175+500～K176+600 in Guizhou Province was taken as an example,some methods,such as seismic imaging method,seismic surface wave method,method of 3-electrode electrical sounding,method of high density resistivity,transient electromagnetic method,method of ground probing radar,were applied in reconnaissance. The explanation results are comprehensively analyzed by different physical exploration methods adopted in the same location,the method of marking those results is used to judge the characters of the abnormality,then the accuracy of physical exploration results is improved. 7figs.,3tabs.,8refs.

WSSrS7ha.title: Application of Anchorage Cable and Anti-sliding Pile on Treatmeat of Bedding Rock Slope
WSSrS7ha.abstract: An emphasis is taken on analysising why the landslide happens,in segment of K158+980～K159+160 at Zhenning-Shengjingguan Expressway,which is a bedding rock slope at left of the route.Using the method of comprehensive internal friction φ,the shear strength parameters of sliding plane are detemined by back-calculating,in order to supply reasonable parameters on calculating the rest pust of the landslide.The calculation results show that the distributed steel of anti-slide pile tends to be more safe,on the condition of the landslide-thrust being rectangular distributed.Combining the concrete frame attached with anchorage cable,the mid-body of the slope is reinforced,and a part of rest push which is loaded on the anti-slide pile is shared by the concrete frame,so the anti-slide safety of the slope is updated.The last treatment effect indicates that it is an effective means by combining anti-slide pile with anchorage cable,in the treatment of bedding rock landslide.

Q3uTsr6M.title: On Comprehensive Treatmeat of the Sanhetou Slope of Chong-zun Highway
Q3uTsr6M.abstract: The cause of slope is analysised,and an evaluation is taken on its stability.Combining deep crossrange displacement monitoring with engineering geological investigation,the main sliding direction is clear and the mayor slip surface accurately positioned.By soil test of after field sampling,the density ρ and the cohesion c of slip zone soil are determined.Through the method of anti-analysis,on the condition of the safety factor k=0.95,the value selection of angle of internal friction φ is figured out.According to the rest push,the model of h form anti-slide pile is creatively established.And it has a good effect by Partitional comprehensive treatment.This is a successful improvement scheme,which will be of reference value for other landslide treatment practices of large rest push.

MPmNOOuI.title: Application of ANSYS on the Design of h Form Anti-slide Pile
MPmNOOuI.abstract: According to the large rest push of slide,a type of anti-slide pile is schemed out,which shape is same as h.Based on the finite element program of ANSYS,a numerical analysis is taken on the stresss state of the pile,by the model of numerical analysis.And the model is set up by the element of BEAM3.It makes an reasonable assumption on the boundary conditions of the anti-slide pile.The calculation results show the stress characteristics of the h form anti-slide pile,and the pile is loaded by the rest push.The h form anti-slide pile decomposes the load which acts on the mail pile,and partly transmits it to the beam and the vice-pile.By this way,the h form anti-slide pile can bear large rest push of the slide.

ZllcTfMR.title: Application of karst hazard zoning to advance geological forecasting in tunnels
ZllcTfMR.abstract: Regarding the development characteristics of the karst in the Shajinjie Tunnel on the Ximen-Chengdu Highway, a new concept of "karst hazard zoning" is put forward and applied to advance geological forecasting in tunnels. Based on the geological conditions discovered during the middle pilot heading excavation, some revisions were made with respect to the karst hazard zoning in order to guide the advance forecasting in the main tunnel. Meanwhile, the high-density electrical method was combined with the geological radar method, improving the accuracy of forecasting in major karst hazards. The excavation results show that the outcomes of advance geological forecasting are highly consistent with the actual ones.

9k8YVTuu.title: On the Techniques of Comprehensive Pretection for Slope
9k8YVTuu.abstract: Several major techniques of comprehensive pretection for slope are introduced at present,and their features are discussed.The basic fundamentals of comprehensive pretection are represented,from water and soil conservation,ecological recovery,reinforcement of slope.But also,an analysis of comprehensive performance is taken on the techniques of comprehensive pretection for slope.The case study shows that the performance of comprehensive protection is the best than plant-covering protection and engineering protection.

Jz4nRQSb.title: A Hybrid Carrier Tracking Algorithm Based on FQFD,FLL and PLL
Jz4nRQSb.abstract: Carrier tracking is one of the key technologies of software GPS receiver.The capability of software GPS receiver is almost depended on it.According to a common structure of carrier tracking,the frequently used devices of carrier tracking such as four quadrant frequency discriminator(FQFD),frequency lock loop(FLL) and phase lock loop(PLL) are analyzed.The work principles and performance of them are validated by simulation.Based on these three devices,a new mixed carrier tracking loop is designed.The capability of the new carrier tracking is simulated and the result proved that whenever the Doppler frequency is a constant value,a step equation,a simple equation or a quadratic equation of time,the carrier can all be tracked by using the new carrier tracking loop.So it can be concluded that the new carrier tracking is effective.

eyJ0pjN8.title: Hardware-in-the-loop simulation technology for size of laser facular of laser guided weapon
eyJ0pjN8.abstract: The simulation of the size of the target laser facular is a key process of the Hardware-in-the-loop (HWIL) simulation of laser guided weapons. Through the analysis of the principle of laser guidance seeker, the model for position and size of laser facular in laboratory is built. According to the principle of comparability, the telescope system is used to control the movement of the size of laser facular, and the real target laser facular sought by the guidance seeker is simulated. Based on the mathematical model, the simulation experiments were carried out. The experimental results prove that the mathematic models are right and the simulation way of the size of the target laser facular is realizable, which resolves the key problem of HWIL simulation of laser guided weapon.

f8nsUznP.title: Research on hardware-in-the-loop simulation integrated platform based on multi real-time network
f8nsUznP.abstract: The hardware-in-the-loop simulation experiments have been the absolutely necessarily tache in the R and D process for guided weapons. Hardware-in-the-Loop Simulation Integrated Platform Based on Multi Real-time Network is an promotion upon the primary system, including two kinds of real-time networks: the reflective memory and the broadcast memory, Three operating systems: Windows, DOS and LABVIEV RT. The principle of the Simulation Integrated Platform was introduced. The key techniques include the real-time data acquisition in LABVIEV RT, the real-time data saving and the real-time network interface. At last, the test method and the test outcome were given. At present, this Hardware-in-the-Loop Simulation Integrated Platform has come on the line.

Cz4wNR1z.title: Small Infrared Target Detection Based on Nonsubsampled Contourlet Transform
Cz4wNR1z.abstract: The small infrared target detection methods used in the presence of background interference and noises are analyzed.A small infrared target detection algorithm combining temporal domain with spatial domain is put forward.First,the interference from background and noises is reduced by using conjoint frame subtraction because of the slow change of background.Then,the nonsubsampled Contourlet transform is implemented for the residual image so as to eliminate the residual background and noises and enhance the signal-to-noise ratio of the small targets.Finally,the enhanced image is processed by using the adaptive threshold and the small target is detected.The simulation result shows that compared with the small infrared target detection algorithm based on wavelet transform,this method can more precisely detect small infrared targets and has a higher detection effectiveness and a lower average false alarm rate.

vGuxaona.title: An Improved D-S Algorithm Based on Distance of Evidence
vGuxaona.abstract: To solve the invalidation problem of Dempster-Shafer evidence combination rule with high conflict,the concept of credibility is defined to prescribe reliability of evidence and novel improved D-S algorithm is proposed.Through the distance of evidence,the proposed algorithm first constructs a similarity matrix and obtains credibility of evidence,and then preprocesses evidence through introducing credibility,finally combines preprocessed evidence using Dempster's rule.The numerical study shows that,compared with other methods,the new algorithm can deal with high evidence conflict and reduce influence of conflict evidence effectively,and can accelerate convergence and reduce the decision risk.

KgvoRfqk.title: Fault diagnosis method based on residual chi-square assisted by adaptive filter for navigation system
KgvoRfqk.abstract: Residual chi-square test is not sensitive to soft faults and also unable to detect suddenly changing faults well in inaccurate observation noise. Therefore, a diagnosis method of residual chi-square test assisted by restricted adaptive filter was proposed to solve the problem. A restricted adaptive filtering algorithm was derived based on Bayesian theory to estimate the observation noise matrix automatically and on-line. In doing so, the proposed algorithm could prevent the filtering prediction from tracking soft faults and then assist the residual chi-square test during fault detection. To overcome the problems of filtering precision decline and the increase of the error detection rate caused by immediately isolating fault method, a fault disposal and reconstruction method was developed based on one-step predicting information, which is generated by forecasting the current navigation information using the resolved results in the frontal time. Simulation results show that the proposed method can effectively diagnose suddenly changing faults and soft faults online, and ensure system precision during the failure phase. Moreover, the system can be recovered timely from the fault state when the fault signals disappear, and thus the system reliability can be improved.

W9s46lJY.title: Star Centroiding Algorithm for High-noising Situation
W9s46lJY.abstract: Considering the difficulties in star centroiding computation of star image that is polluted by strong noises, a centroiding algorithm based on threshold judging with sub-window gray distribution static evaluation was proposed. With certain number of sub-windows with certain size chosen based on the image character, the gray distribution was studied and the decentralization was calculated. After the judgment of decentralization according certain rules, sub-windows which contain peak noise regions or those unfavorable would be displaced by new chose ones. Hence, the threshold gray value final gained would represent the comprehensive character of the star image and the succeeding application of square-weighted subdivision algorithm could improve the succeeding centroiding algorithm's accuracy. Simulation and result analysis proved a pleasant performance and robust capacity against sever peak noises of the proposed algorithm.

9i57UEGi.title: Universal star centroiding with stepping variant weighting integration
9i57UEGi.abstract: In order to solve the centroiding problem of an over exposed star in star image processing, a universal centroiding algorithm was proposed with "first local calculation and then comprehensive integration". First, the existence of the over exposure stars was confirmed with real star images. Then, by analyzing the grey distribution of over exposed stars, the over-exposure scale of every row/column was detected according to the corresponding grey value and the square weighted mass centroiding was applied to calculation of primary local results. Finally, an over-exposure scale related to scaling scheme was used again to decide corresponding weights of local results and the final result was obtained after a last integration. The simulation results prove that in an all-random experiment mode the final centroiding accuracy has be better than 0.05 pixel even the random noise is 30 pixel. The proposed algorithm is validated to be competent and could satisfy the demand of the centroiding algorithm for the high-accuracy and good adaptability in real applications.

FDnOSVLh.title: On Atmospheric Attenuating Model in HWIL Simulation of 1.064 μm Laser Guided Weapons
FDnOSVLh.abstract: In Hardware-in-the-loop(HWIL) simulation of laser guided weapon systemsthe simulation accuracy of the whole system is directly determined by the laser atmospheric attenuating model.In order to supply a simple laser atmospheric attenuating modelwhich can meet the need of simulationwe divided the aerosol teams into six parts of aerosols(cloudless and fogless)cloudfograinsnow and war-smokebased on the battle-field environment taking into consideration of the absorption and scattering effects of the atmospheric component.The atmospheric attenuating law of laser radiation was used together with some of the empirical formula for establishing the atmospheric attenuating model of each part.Finallythe model was used to calculate the atmospheric attenuation of laser transmission under several typical weather conditions.The result was compared with the calculation result of the LOWTRAN7which showed that the model is correct and effective.

XQkTw8oq.title: A Fault-tolerant Navigation Algorithm of Multiple Satellite Based on Strong Tracking Filter
XQkTw8oq.abstract: To solve the problem of invalid position determining due to uncertainty of category and quantity of malfunctioned satellites in the multiple satellite system,a fault-tolerant integrated navigation algorithm of multiple satellite based on strong tracking filter is proposed.First,a fault-tolerant system structure based on cell level fusion mode is proposed.The local filter and the fault detection and isolation based on strong tracking filter are designed for single satellite,and an improved residual fault detection method is presented.Federated filter is used in general algorithm.Finally,a fault-tolerant integrated navigation algorithm of BD/GPS/GLONASS system is designed.The results show that the proposed algorithm using multi-satellite system for position defermining is effective and the malfunctioned satellites of different satellite systems are detected and isolated synchronously.The system precision and reliability are improved effectively.

3Cqgumv6.title: A Novel High Sensitive Fast Acquisition Algorithm of GPS Signals
3Cqgumv6.abstract: To improve the sensitivity and fast acquisition ability of a GPS software receiver,a novel acquisition scheme is presented.Firstly,by compensating the frequency of the intermediate frequency(IF) signal to improve its cyclicity,the signal-to-noise ratio(SNR) of the IF signal can be improved by using coherent average algorithm.So the sensitivity of acquisition algorithm is improved.Secondly,the C/A code start of every satellite is searched through the delay-multiply configuration,then the delay and accumulation unit is put forward to pretreat the multi-frequency signals.Finally,the separation and estimation of Doppler-shift components are fulfilled by frequency domain analysis on post-treatment signals,therefore,the two-dimensional searching process in conventional acquisition scheme is transformed into two one-dimensional searching processes in the proposed acquisition scheme.In the proposed acquisition scheme,a shorted fast Fourier transform(FFT) version is adopted,which can greatly reduce the computation burden without degradation on performance.Sampled data from GPS receiver and simulated GPS signals are used for simulation experiments.Simulation results indicate effectiveness of the proposed acquisition scheme.

VHXmfnzB.title: Precise Simulation for Line of Sight of Laser-guided Weapons
VHXmfnzB.abstract: To improve the simulation precision of Line of Sight of Laser Target Seeker(LSLTS),the source of the errors affecting the precision is analyzed according to the process of the simulation.The precision model of angel of LSLTS is constituted based on errors composition theory,and the evaluation criteria of the whole screen is established.On the basis of the criteria,the equipments layout of the laboratory is designed by applying the Genetic Algorithm(GA).The distribution of angel errors in the screen is achieved,which gives support to the design of the LSLTS simulation.
